itemTypes.name: Cleanser
itemTypes.description: Products used to clean the skin and remove makeup, dirt, and oil.

itemTypes.name: Moisturizer
itemTypes.description: Products used to hydrate and soften the skin.

itemTypes.name: Serum
itemTypes.description: Concentrated treatments that target specific skin concerns.

itemTypes.name: Sunscreen
itemTypes.description: Products that protect the skin from UV rays.

itemTypes.name: Exfoliator
itemTypes.description: Products that remove dead skin cells and improve skin texture.
